root.HEADER: RADIO X-CEIVER ADMINISTRATION MANAGED OBJECT CAPABILITY INFORMATION

OMLF1.F1: TRXC function change not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F2: Automatic ciphering capability not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F3: IRC not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F4: Antenna Hopping not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F5: Frame Synchronization using GPS not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F7: Automatic parameter setting in TG synchronization on TG level not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F8: Feature Packet Abis over TDM not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F9: Feature Packet Abis over IP not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F10: FFTAD not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F11: PSU Power Savings not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F12: SC Quality Report II not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F13: Time Slot Power Savings not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F14: Multiple CCCH not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F15: MCTR not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F16: Current supervised TMA not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F17: Antenna interface standards group TMA not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F18: Antenna interface standards group RET not supported by BTS.
OMLF1.F19: VAMOS not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F20: TS configuration split not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F21: AQPSK with non-zero SCPIR not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F22: MCTR maximum allowed power extension not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F23: BCCH Power Savings not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F24: BTS Soft Synchronization not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F25: Native IP Configuration not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F26: RRUS Cascading not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F27: Reporting of Access Burst Info not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F28: Decimal resolution of configured power not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F29: Node Group Synchronization not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F30: Extended Coverage not supported by the BTS.
OMLF1.F31: Synchronization Observability not supported by the BTS.

OMLF2.F1: Frequency measurements not supported by the BTS.

RSLF1.F2: BCCH information phase 2 not supported, Layer 3 (L3) information must be included in Slow Associated Control Channel (SACCH) filling, and immediate assign phase 2 not supported.
RSLF1.F3: Extended range not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F4: A5/2 algorithm not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F7: Power information not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F8: 0A5/1 algorithm not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F9: GPRS not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F10: eMLPP priority not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F11: Extended CBCH not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F13: A5/3 algorithm not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F14: Reporting of BTS Counters not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F15: IS Connection Point (ICP) List in channel activation not supported.
RSLF1.F16: EMR functionality not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F18: VGCS not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F19: VGCS Enhancements not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F20: FFAD not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F21: Enhanced Handover Success Rate not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F22: Repeated SACCH not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F23: RTTI not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F24: PTA regulation algorithm 1 not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F25: PAN not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F26: Random fill bits not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F27: BS Power 2 not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F28: DRX mode not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F29: 0VAMOS enhancements in BSC G12B release not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F30: Packet Data Channel (PDCH) options not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F31: Random SI6 fill bits not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F34: A5/4 algorithm not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F35: Extended Coverage not supported by the BTS.
RSLF1.F36: Extended DRX not supported by the BTS.

TCFMODE.N0: 2.4 kbps or less data, transparent TCH/F2.4 + Fast Associated Control Channel (FACCH/F) + SACCH/TF according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination i) using channel code for data rate 2.4 kbps or less as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing transparent mode.
TCFMODE.N1:
4.8 kbps data, transparent
TCH/F4.8 + FACCH/F + SACCH/TF according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination i) using channel code for data rate 4.8 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing transparent mode.
TCFMODE.N2:
4.8 kbps data, non-transparent
TCH/F4.8 + FACCH/F + SACCH/TF according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination i) using channel code for data rate 4.8 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing non-transparent mode.
TCFMODE.N3:
9.6 kbps data, transparent
TCH/F9.6 + FACCH/F + SACCH/TF according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination i) using channel code for data rate 9.6 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing transparent mode.
TCFMODE.N4:
9.6 kbps data, non-transparent
TCH/F9.6 + FACCH/F + SACCH/TF according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination i) using channel code for data rate 9.6 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing non-transparent mode.
TCFMODE.N5:
Full rate speech version 1, full rate
TCH/FS + FACCH/F + SACCH/TF according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination i) using channel code for TCH/FS according to 3GPP TS 45.003 and speech transcoding according to GSM 06.01.
TCFMODE.N6:
Full rate speech version 2, PCS enhanced full rate
TCH/FS + FACCH/F + SACCH/TF according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination i) using PCS enhanced speech transcoding and either, channel code for TCH/FS according to 3GPP TS 45.003, or a PCS enhanced speech transcoding specific channel code.
TCFMODE.N7:
2.4 kbps or less multislot data, transparent
TCH/F2.4 + FACCH/F + SACCH/M or TCH/F2.4 + SACCH/M or TCH/F2.4 + SACCH/MD according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations viii) - x) and 6.4.2, using channel code for channel data rate 2.4 kbps and less as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing transparent mode for symmetric or asymmetric multislot configurations.
TCFMODE.N8:
4.8 kbps multislot data, transparent
TCH/F4.8 + FACCH/F + SACCH/M or TCH/F4.8 + SACCH/M or TCH/F4.8 + SACCH/MD according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations viii) - x) and 6.4.2, using channel code for channel data rate 4.8 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing transparent mode for symmetric or asymmetric multislot configurations.
TCFMODE.N9:
4.8 kbps multislot data, non-transparent
TCH/F4.8 + FACCH/F + SACCH/M or TCH/F4.8 + SACCH/M or TCH/F4.8 + SACCH/MD according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations viii) - x) and 6.4.2, using channel code for channel data rate 4.8 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing non-transparent mode for symmetric or asymmetric multislot configurations.
TCFMODE.N10:
9.6 kbps multislot data, transparent
TCH/F9.6 + FACCH/F + SACCH/M or TCH/F9.6 + SACCH/M or TCH/F9.6 + SACCH/MD according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations viii) - x) and 6.4.2, using channel code for channel data rate 9.6 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing transparent mode for symmetric or asymmetric multislot configurations.
TCFMODE.N11:
9.6 kbps multislot data, non-transparent
TCH/F9.6 + FACCH/F + SACCH/M or TCH/F9.6 + SACCH/M or TCH/F9.6 + SACCH/MD according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations viii) - x) and 6.4.2, using channel code for channel data rate 9.6 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing non-transparent mode for symmetric or asymmetric multislot configurations.
TCFMODE.N12:
14.4 kbps data, transparent
TCH/F14.4 + FACCH/F + SACCH/F according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4 combination i) using channel code for data rate 14.4 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing transparent mode.
TCFMODE.N13:
14.4 kbps data, non-transparent
TCH/F14.4 + FACCH/F + SACCH/F according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4 combination i) using channel code for data rate 14.4 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing non-transparent mode.
TCFMODE.N14:
14.4 kbps multislot data, transparent
TCH/F14.4 + FACCH/F + SACCH/F or TCH/F14.4 + SACCH/M or TCH/F14.4 - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1, combinations viii) -x) and 6.4.2 using channel code for channel data rate 14.4 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing transparent mode for symmetric or asymmetric multislot configurations.
TCFMODE.N15:
14.4 kbps multislot data, non-transparent
TCH/F14.4 + FACCH/F + SACCH/F or TCH/F14.4 + SACCH/M or TCH/F14.4 - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1, combinations viii) -x) and 6.4.2 using channel code for channel data rate 14.4 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing non-transparent mode for symmetric or asymmetric multislot configurations.
TCFMODE.N16:
GPRS coding scheme 1
Packet Broadcast Control Channel (PBCCH) + Packet Common Control Channel (PCCCH) + Packet Data Traffic Channel (PDTCH) + Packet Associated Control Channel (PACCH) + Packet Timing Advance Control Channel (PTCCH) or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1, combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2 using channel code for packet data block type 1 (CS-1) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N17:
GPRS coding scheme 2
PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1, combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2 using channel code for packet data block type 2 (CS-2) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N18:
GPRS coding scheme 3
PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1, combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2 using channel code for packet data block type 3 (CS-3) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N19:
GPRS coding scheme 4
PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1, combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2 using channel code for packet data block type 4 (CS-4) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N20:
Extended packet access
PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1, combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2 using extended packet access burst as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N21:
TCH/FS + FACCH/F + SACCH/TF according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination i) using channel code for TCH/FS according to 3GPP TS 45.003, and Adaptive Multi-Rate (AMR) speech transcoding.
Indicates capability for AMR speech transcoding using the following speech codec modes: TCH/AFS12.2, TCH/AFS10.2, TCH/AFS7.95, TCH/AFS7.4, TCH/AFS6.7, TCH/AFS5.9, TCH/AFS5.15, TCH/AFS4.75.
TCFMODE.N22: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for modulation and coding scheme type 1 (MCS-1) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N23: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for modulation and coding scheme type 2 (MCS-2) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N24: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for modulation and coding scheme type 3 (MCS-3) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N25: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for modulation and coding scheme type 4 (MCS-4) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N26: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for modulation and coding scheme type 5 (MCS-5) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N27: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for modulation and coding scheme type 6 (MCS-6) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N28: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for modulation and coding scheme type 7 (MCS-7) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N29: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for modulation and coding scheme type 8 (MCS-8) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N30: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PCCCH + PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH or PDTCH + PACCH + PTCCH - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for modulation and coding scheme type 9 (MCS-9) as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCFMODE.N31: Frequency Correction Channel (FCCH) + Synchronization Channel (SCH) + BCCH + CCCH or FCCH + SCH + BCCH + CCCH + Stand-alone Dedicated Control Channel (SDCCH) SDCCH/4(0..3) + SACCH/4(0..3) - see 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations iv) - v), using Enhanced General Packet Radio Service (EGPRS) packet channel request as specified in 3GPP TS 44.060.
TCFMODE.N32:
TCH/FS + FACCH/F + SACCH/TF according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination i) using channel code for TCH/FS according to 3GPP TS 45.003, and wideband AMR speech transcoding
Indicates capability for wideband AMR speech transcoding, which uses coding algorithm version 5, using the following speech codec modes according to 3GPP TS 45.003: TCH/WFS12.65, TCH/WFS8.85, TCH/WFS6.60.
TCFMODE.N33: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for DAS-5 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N34: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for DAS-6 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N35: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for DAS-7 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N36: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for DAS-8 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N37: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for DAS-9 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N38: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for DAS-10 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N39: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for DAS-11 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N40: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for DAS-12 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N41: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for UAS-7 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N42: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for UAS-8 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N43: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for UAS-9 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N44: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for UAS-10 as specified in GSM 45.003.
TCFMODE.N45: PBCCH + PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PCCCH + PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F or PDTCH/F + PACCH/F + PTCCH/F - see GSM 45.002, section 6.4.1 combinations xi) - xiii) and 6.4.2, using channel code for UAS-11 as specified in GSM 45.003.

TCHMODE.N0:
2.4 kbps or less data
TCH/H2.4(n) + FACCH/H(n) + SACCH/TH(n), where n = 0 or n = 1, according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination ii) using channel code for data rate 2.4 kbps or less as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003.
TCHMODE.N1:
4.8 kbps data, transparent
TCH/H4.8(n) + FACCH/H(n) + SACCH/TH(n), where n = 0 or n = 1, according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination ii) using channel code for data rate 4.8 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing transparent mode.
TCHMODE.N2:
4.8 kbps data, non-transparent
TCH/H4.8(n) + FACCH/H(n) + SACCH/TH(n), where n = 0 or n = 1, according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination ii) using channel code for data rate 4.8 kbps as specified in 3GPP TS 45.003, providing non-transparent mode.
TCHMODE.N3:
Half rate speech version 1, Half Rate
TCH/HS(n) + FACCH/H(n) + SACCH/TH(n), where n = 0 or n = 1, according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination ii) using channel code for TCH/HS according to 3GPP TS 45.003 and speech transcoding according to GSM 06.02.
TCHMODE.N4:
TCH/HS(n) + FACCH/H(n) + SACCH/TH(n), where n = 0 or 1, according to 3GPP TS 45.002, section 6.4, combination ii) using channel code for TCH/HS according to 3GPP TS 45.003, and AMR speech transcoding.
Indicates capability for AMR speech transcoding, which uses speech coding algorithm version 3, using the following speech codec modes according to 3GPP TS 45.003: TCH/AHS7.4, TCH/AHS6.7, TCH/AHS5.9, TCH/AHS5.15, TCH/AHS4.75.
